desc: New Zealand's number 1 supplier of at home hair equipment, groomers and tools. We have the best range of Hair Cut Kits, Hair Clippers, Beard Trimmers, Hair Straighteners, Hair Removal, Hair Stylers, Hair Dryers, Head Shavers, Rotary Shavers, Foil Shavers and Laser Hair Removal.

layout.text: New Zealand's #1 grooming shop for shaving, hair removal, hair care & oral hygiene
We supply all summer must-haves! From lockdown essentials like hair clippers and shavers, to body groomers, multigroomers, IPLs, ladies' shavers, epilators and all important genuine spare parts.
